overview.headline: MagicMirror
overview.subline: Your personal portal to flawless skin.

conditions.name: High CRI
conditions.description: Mirrors the natural daylight to truthfully reveal your skin condition.

conditions.name: Parallel-Polarization
conditions.description: Enhances skin texture and surface visibility, ideal for detecting concerns like ageing, altered keratinization, dry/oily skin, and wrinkles.

conditions.name: Cross-Polarization
conditions.description: Emphasizes sub-surface features, expertly exposing the underlying issues like vasculature, pigmented lesions, and post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation.

conditions.name: UV Light
conditions.description: Unveils the unseen by disclosing potential damage beneath the skin’s top layer, uncovering early signs of sun damage, porphyrin in acne, and pigment irregularities.

concerns.name: Wrinkle Assessment
concerns.description: A thorough investigation into skin ageing, offering precise measurements of wrinkle location, length, and thickness.

concerns.name: Acne Analysis
concerns.description: A comprehensive overview of acne presence, including detailed metrics for blackheads and pimples, supported by a Post-Acne Hyperpigmentation Index (PAHI) assessment.

concerns.name: Pigmentation Profiling
concerns.description: An in-depth study of skin pigmentation, featuring location, area, and intensity metrics, along with a Melasma Area and Severity Index (MASI) assessment.

concerns.name: Skin Tone Evaluation
concerns.description: A complete skin tone analysis based on the Fitzpatrick scale.

concerns.name: Eye Circle Examination
concerns.description: A focused evaluation of under-eye health and appearance.

information.message: MagicMirror™ is currently undergoing its final stages of development. Stay tuned for updates - the unveiling of MagicMirror™ is just around the corner. Together, let's step into the next era of skincare.
